name: .RAW.XXX File Extension
summary: Learn about .RAW.XXX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A RAW.XXX file is a virtual SD card currently being written to by Dolphin, a video game console emulator. You may encounter RAW.XXX cards when Dolphin is saving data (such as a saved game) to your virtual SD card. Typically, RAW.XXX files are named sd.raw.xxx.

content: Dolphin is a Nintendo GameCube and Wii emulator that gamers use to play GameCube and Wii games on their PCs. Those using Dolphin to play Wii games can use a .RAW file as a virtual SD card. Just as the Nintendo Wii loads data from and saves data to a physical SD card, Dolphin loads data from and saves data to RAW files.

While Dolphin is writing data to a player's RAW file, it appends the .xxx extension to that file. This signals that a player should not close Dolphin or move or modify their RAW file, since it is currently being written to. After Dolphin finishes writing data to a .raw.xxx file, it removes the .xxx extension from that file's name.

instructions: RAW.XXX files are not meant to be opened. After Dolphin finishes writing data to your virtual SD card, it will automatically remove the .xxx extension, leaving it as a normal .RAW file.
